title: Machine Learning-Based Crop Disease Prediction and Early Harvest Optimization

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary statistical analysis, Python programming, and fundamental crop cultivation theory
context.additional_context: A project-based learning environment applying practical mathematical modeling and machine learning techniques to develop crop productivity solutions.

learning_goals: Learners can design preprocessing pipelines for disease pattern analysis using crop image datasets
Learners can implement a system that predicts crop diseases with over 90% accuracy by combining Threshold Segmentation and Random Forest classification models
Learners can establish early harvest timing optimization strategies and conduct economic analysis based on machine learning results
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
